CreateCertificateAuthority.name: CreateCertificateAuthority
CreateCertificateAuthority.description: Creates an ACM Private CA and its associated private key and configuration.

CreateCertificateAuthorityAuditReport.name: CreateCertificateAuthorityAuditReport
CreateCertificateAuthorityAuditReport.description: Creates an audit report for an ACM Private CA.

CreatePermission.name: CreatePermission
CreatePermission.description: Creates a permission for an ACM Private CA.

DeleteCertificateAuthority.name: DeleteCertificateAuthority
DeleteCertificateAuthority.description: Deletes an ACM Private CA and its associated private key and configuration.

DeletePermission.name: DeletePermission
DeletePermission.description: Deletes a permission for an ACM Private CA.

DeletePolicy.name: DeletePolicy
DeletePolicy.description: Deletes the policy for an ACM Private CA.

DescribeCertificateAuthority.name: DescribeCertificateAuthority
DescribeCertificateAuthority.description:
Returns a list of the configuration and status fields contained in the specified ACM
                                                Private CA.

DescribeCertificateAuthorityAuditReport.name: DescribeCertificateAuthorityAuditReport
DescribeCertificateAuthorityAuditReport.description: Returns the status and information about an ACM Private CA audit report.

GetCertificate.name: GetCertificate
GetCertificate.description:
Retrieves an ACM Private CA certificate and certificate chain for the certificate
                                                authority specified by an ARN.

GetCertificateAuthorityCertificate.name: GetCertificateAuthorityCertificate
GetCertificateAuthorityCertificate.description:
Retrieves an ACM Private CA certificate and certificate chain for the certificate
                                                authority specified by an ARN.

GetCertificateAuthorityCsr.name: GetCertificateAuthorityCsr
GetCertificateAuthorityCsr.description:
Retrieves an ACM Private CA certificate signing request (CSR) for the certificate-authority
                                                specified by an ARN.

GetPolicy.name: GetPolicy
GetPolicy.description: Retrieves the policy on an ACM Private CA.

ImportCertificateAuthorityCertificate.name: ImportCertificateAuthorityCertificate
ImportCertificateAuthorityCertificate.description:
Imports an SSL/TLS certificate into ACM Private CA for use as the CA certificate of
                                                an ACM Private CA.

IssueCertificate.name: IssueCertificate
IssueCertificate.description: Issues an ACM Private CA certificate.

ListCertificateAuthorities.name: ListCertificateAuthorities
ListCertificateAuthorities.description:
Retrieves a list of the ACM Private CA certificate authority ARNs, and a summary of
                                                the status of each CA in the calling account.

ListPermissions.name: ListPermissions
ListPermissions.description: Lists the permissions that have been applied to the ACM Private CA certificate authority.

ListTags.name: ListTags
ListTags.description: Lists the tags that have been applied to the ACM Private CA certificate authority.

PutPolicy.name: PutPolicy
PutPolicy.description: Puts a policy on an ACM Private CA.

RestoreCertificateAuthority.name: RestoreCertificateAuthority
RestoreCertificateAuthority.description: Restores an ACM Private CA from the deleted state to the state it was in when deleted.

RevokeCertificate.name: RevokeCertificate
RevokeCertificate.description: Revokes a certificate issued by an ACM Private CA.

TagCertificateAuthority.name: TagCertificateAuthority
TagCertificateAuthority.description: Adds one or more tags to an ACM Private CA.

UntagCertificateAuthority.name: UntagCertificateAuthority
UntagCertificateAuthority.description: Remove one or more tags from an ACM Private CA.

UpdateCertificateAuthority.name: UpdateCertificateAuthority
UpdateCertificateAuthority.description: Updates the configuration of an ACM Private CA.

name: AWS Certificate Manager Private Certificate Authority
